page.title: 09RECREATION IN NORTHWOLD
page.content: Leisure activities are very varied in the village.Many activities are centered around the home - gardening, home maintenance and improvements,car repairs.Reading and card playing are popular pastimes paticularly during winter evenings.There are also local whist drives away from the village. Anyone interested in swimming has to travel to one of the local towns. Other activities are connected with the countryside - bird watching, shooting,fishing,walking along the local footpaths and studying buildings and churches. Many older people also enjoy a short drive around the narrow lanes which join the local villages.In this way they may catch a glimpse of deer, foxes,squirrels,pheasants and hedgehogs - all of which can be seen on occasions.
